materials.raw_text:
Bismuth (Bi) - 70.6 g 
 Lithium (Li) - 12.8 g 
 Tin (Sn) - 1.2 g 
 Terbium (Tb) - 15.4 g

sourcing.instructions: Bismuth can be sourced from metal suppliers or online retailers specializing in metals. Lithium can be found through chemical suppliers or battery manufacturers. Tin can be obtained from hardware stores or metal suppliers. Terbium can be sourced from rare earth element suppliers or online chemical retailers.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using a digital scale. 
 2. In a clean crucible, combine Bismuth, Lithium, Tin, and Terbium in the specified amounts. 
 3. Stir the mixture until homogenous using a non-reactive stirring rod.
